column4: perhaps the problem is the same for compiling any kernel in a SATA hdd.
has anyone compiled 2.6.16.28 on a sata hdd? Specifically on a thinkpad t43
mkinitrd returns that module sd_mod and sg which are needed for sata are not found. any ideas?
ubuntu uses initramfs-tools, not mkinitrd... (tho it might be symlinked)
